body_html: @LeavesBreathe I was wrong initially about how easy it would be, since the gradient operators as written taken the original input. Thus, we probably do need a new exposed op, though it may be able to use the same underlying compute kernels (I'm not sure).
body_text: @LeavesBreathe I was wrong initially about how easy it would be, since the gradient operators as written taken the original input.  Thus, we probably do need a new exposed op, though it may be able to use the same underlying compute kernels (I'm not sure).
body: @LeavesBreathe I was wrong initially about how easy it would be, since the gradient operators as written taken the original input.  Thus, we probably do need a new exposed op, though it may be able to use the same underlying compute kernels (I'm not sure).
